::

    ../resources/examples/minimal.sh -h

    This is a minimal demo of Argbash potential
    Usage: ../resources/examples/minimal.sh [--option <arg>] [--(no-)print] [--version] [--help] <positional-arg>
    	<positional-arg>: Positional arg description
    	-o,--option: A option with short and long flags and default (default: 'b')
    	--print,--no-print: A boolean option with long flag (and implicit default: off) (default: 'off')
    	-v,--version: Prints version
    	-h,--help: Prints help
